title: American Summer
copy: Sierra Mist. Lemon. Strawberry. This exhilarating mix is the perfect drink for a hot summer day (or anytime, really).

title: Ruby Juicy
copy: What's better than a cold Tropicana Lemonade? How about one with strawberry, cherry and raspberry flavor shots.

title: Sun Blossom
copy: Liven up your Brisk Tea with a triple shot of lemon, peach and cherry for a no-calorie way to brighten your day.
